Recyclable_Piping.name: Recyclable Piping

physics_models.name: Flow Rate
physics_models.coding_directives: A is the cross-sectional area, v is the flow velocity.
physics_models.python_code:
def calculate_flow_rate(area, velocity):
    return area * velocity
physics_models.coder_notes: This model calculates the flow rate through the piping.

Recyclable_Piping.verification_plan: Test the piping for durability and recyclability according to ISO standards.
